summary: SEAT BELTS AND REAR AXLE  WERE RECALLED ON THIS VEHICLE SIX MONTHS AGO, AND THE DEALERSHIP CLAIMS THEY CAN NOT GET PARTS TO FIX THESE.  THESE ARE MAJOR SAFETY ISSUES, AND SHOULD BE ATTENDED TO IN A MUCH MORE TIMELY FASHION THAN SIX MONTHS.  I HAVE CONSISTENTLY CALLED FOR THESE CAN THEY TELL ME THEY CANT GET PARTS TO FIX THESE.
